text: ovungē piṭupǣma num̆ba veta daruṇu vūyē nam eviṭa obaṭa hækiyāva tibē nam mahapoḷovehi umagak soyā hō ahasa mata inimagak tabā næga yāmen hō ovun veta oba sādhakayak rægena pæmiṇiyada (ovun piṭupāminma siṭiti.) tavada allāh abhimata kaḷē nam yahaman̆ga mata ovun va ræs karannaṭa tibuṇi. ebævin num̆ba agnānayin aturin novanu
